title: Our Experience, Your Home - Res Lease in San Marcos. 4 Beds, 2 Baths
posting_body: Schedule your tour today to lease this incredible 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom home in San Marcos TX!
This lovely home offers numerous rooms, one that can easily be used for office space!
You'll fall in love with the elegant, refined living room, which features hardwood floors and bright open windows, as well as a fan to help keep the home cool on those hot days.
The home also boasts a beautiful, modern-designed kitchen to make any home chef happy with ample white cabinetry, and plenty of counter space to utilize, and a wine fridge!!!
The primary bedroom has large windows for lots of sunlight as well as a stylish bathroom with white cabinetry, a single vanity, and a large tiled shower; perfect to relax after a long day of work.
Don't forget to check out its amazing fenced backyard!!
The large shade-covered.
and grassy area is ideal for hosting friends and family on those joyous occasions!
Plus the patio flat screen TV stays with the home.
Apply and tour today, it will lease fast!!
All renters are enrolled in the resident benefits package- reach out for more details!
